mapper.select: SELECT di.id, di.name FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM development_value a INNER JOIN development_recently b on a.development_id = b.development_id INNER JOIN development_value_snapshot_mapping c on c.development_value_id = a.id2 ORDER BY a.create_date desc,b.last_time asc ) t1 INNER JOIN development_info di ON di.id * 1 = t1.development_id order by di.name LIMIT 1
